alert.note: Alert for Adams; Kearney (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 4:58PM CDT until July 22 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Adams County in south central Nebraska... Northeastern Kearney County in south central Nebraska... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 458 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Heartwell, or 16 miles southeast of Kearney, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Kenesaw, Holstein, Juniata and Roseland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
